title.narrative: Water Supply And Sanitation Facilities Rehabilitation In Selected Earthquake-Affected Communities Of Nepal

description.narrative: The purpose of the project is to provide safe and healthy learning environment to school children impacted by the earthquake through renovation and reconstruction of water and sanitation and educational facilities in 20 schools in Nepal.

mailing-address.narrative: UN-HABITAT P.O. Box 30030 GPO Nairobi 00100 Kenya

sector.narrative: Basic drinking water supply and basic sanitation

title.narrative: Improvement of health condition of the urban poor, especially children, through improving access to safe drinking water, sanitation and increasing awareness on healthy active living and hygiene practices in select schools in Nepal leading to increased attendance in schools thereby ensuring quality education for underprivileged children.
